code: import{notification}from"antd";var openNotificationWithIcon=function openNotificationWithIcon(type,message,description,placement){placement=placement||"topRight";notification[type]({message:message,description:description,placement:placement});};export var successNotification=function successNotification(message,description,placement){return openNotificationWithIcon('success',message,description,placement);};export var errorNotification=function errorNotification(message,description,placement){return openNotificationWithIcon('error',message,description,placement);};export var infoNotification=function infoNotification(message,description,placement){return openNotificationWithIcon('info',message,description,placement);};export var warningNotification=function warningNotification(message,description,placement){return openNotificationWithIcon('warning',message,description,placement);};
